title: Add Shopping Cart and Checkout Functionality
features: Add items to a persistent shopping cart
View and manage cart contents in a slide-over panel
Real-time cart item count in the header
design: The UI will be integrated with the existing shadcn/ui and TailwindCSS theme, featuring a modern, minimalist design. A slide-over 'Sheet' will be used for the cart, and a clean form for checkout, ensuring a seamless and intuitive user experience.
